00052 /*****************************************************************************
00053  *
00054  * Type conversions.
00055  *

00058 static struct osc_io *cl2osc_io(const struct lu_env *env,
00059                                 const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00060 {
00061         struct osc_io *oio = container_of0(slice, struct osc_io, oi_cl);
00062         LINVRNT(oio == osc_env_io(env));
00063         return oio;
00064 }
00065

00067  *
00068  * io operations.
00069  *
00070  */

00072 static void osc_io_fini(const struct lu_env *env, const struct cl_io_slice *io)
00073 {
00074 }
00075 
00076 static void osc_read_ahead_release(const struct lu_env *env,
00077                                    void *cbdata)
00078 {
00079         struct ldlm_lock *dlmlock = cbdata;
00080         struct lustre_handle lockh;
00081 
00082         ldlm_lock2handle(dlmlock, &lockh);
00083         ldlm_lock_decref(&lockh, LCK_PR);
00084         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(dlmlock);
00085 }
00086 
00087 static int osc_io_read_ahead(const struct lu_env *env,
00088                              const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00089                              pgoff_t start, struct cl_read_ahead *ra)
00090 {
00091         struct osc_object       *osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00092         struct ldlm_lock        *dlmlock;
00093         int                     result = -ENODATA;
00094         ENTRY;
00095 
00096         dlmlock = osc_dlmlock_at_pgoff(env, osc, start, 0);
00097         if (dlmlock != NULL) {
00098                 LASSERT(dlmlock->l_ast_data == osc);
00099                 if (dlmlock->l_req_mode != LCK_PR) {
00100                         struct lustre_handle lockh;
00101                         ldlm_lock2handle(dlmlock, &lockh);
00102                         ldlm_lock_addref(&lockh, LCK_PR);
00103                         ldlm_lock_decref(&lockh, dlmlock->l_req_mode);
00104                 }
00105 
00106                 ra->cra_rpc_size = osc_cli(osc)->cl_max_pages_per_rpc;
00107                 ra->cra_end = cl_index(osc2cl(osc),
00108                                        dlmlock->l_policy_data.l_extent.end);
00109                 ra->cra_release = osc_read_ahead_release;
00110                 ra->cra_cbdata = dlmlock;
00111                 result = 0;
00112         }
00113 
00114         RETURN(result);
00115 }
00116 
00124 static int osc_io_submit(const struct lu_env *env,
00125                          const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00126                          enum cl_req_type crt, struct cl_2queue *queue)
00127 {
00128         struct cl_page    *page;
00129         struct cl_page    *tmp;
00130         struct client_obd *cli  = NULL;
00131         struct osc_object *osc  = NULL; /* to keep gcc happy */
00132         struct osc_page   *opg;
00133         struct cl_io      *io;
00134         struct list_head  list = LIST_HEAD_INIT(list);
00135 
00136         struct cl_page_list *qin      = &queue->c2_qin;
00137         struct cl_page_list *qout     = &queue->c2_qout;
00138         unsigned int queued = 0;
00139         int result = 0;
00140         int cmd;
00141         int brw_flags;
00142         unsigned int max_pages;
00143 
00144         LASSERT(qin->pl_nr > 0);
00145 
00146         CDEBUG(D_CACHE|D_READA, "%d %d\n", qin->pl_nr, crt);
00147 
00148         osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00149         cli = osc_cli(osc);
00150         max_pages = cli->cl_max_pages_per_rpc;
00151 
00152         cmd = crt == CRT_WRITE ? OBD_BRW_WRITE : OBD_BRW_READ;
00153         brw_flags = osc_io_srvlock(cl2osc_io(env, ios)) ? OBD_BRW_SRVLOCK : 0;
00154 
00155         /*
00156          * NOTE: here @page is a top-level page. This is done to avoid
00157          *       creation of sub-page-list.
00158          */
00159         cl_page_list_for_each_safe(page, tmp, qin) {
00160                 struct osc_async_page *oap;
00161 
00162                 /* Top level IO. */
00163                 io = page->cp_owner;
00164                 LASSERT(io != NULL);
00165 
00166                 opg = osc_cl_page_osc(page, osc);
00167                 oap = &opg->ops_oap;
00168                 LASSERT(osc == oap->oap_obj);
00169 
00170                 if (!list_empty(&oap->oap_pending_item) ||
00171                     !list_empty(&oap->oap_rpc_item)) {
00172                         CDEBUG(D_CACHE, "Busy oap %p page %p for submit.\n",
00173                                oap, opg);
00174                         result = -EBUSY;
00175                         break;
00176                 }
00177 
00178                 result = cl_page_prep(env, io, page, crt);
00179                 if (result != 0) {
00180                         LASSERT(result < 0);
00181                         if (result != -EALREADY)
00182                                 break;
00183                         /*
00184                          * Handle -EALREADY error: for read case, the page is
00185                          * already in UPTODATE state; for write, the page
00186                          * is not dirty.
00187                          */
00188                         result = 0;
00189                         continue;
00190                 }
00191 
00192                 spin_lock(&oap->oap_lock);
00193                 oap->oap_async_flags = ASYNC_URGENT|ASYNC_READY;
00194                 oap->oap_async_flags |= ASYNC_COUNT_STABLE;
00195                 spin_unlock(&oap->oap_lock);
00196 
00197                 osc_page_submit(env, opg, crt, brw_flags);
00198                 list_add_tail(&oap->oap_pending_item, &list);
00199 
00200                 if (page->cp_sync_io != NULL)
00201                         cl_page_list_move(qout, qin, page);
00202                 else /* async IO */
00203                         cl_page_list_del(env, qin, page);
00204 
00205                 if (++queued == max_pages) {
00206                         queued = 0;
00207                         result = osc_queue_sync_pages(env, osc, &list, cmd,
00208                                                       brw_flags);
00209                         if (result < 0)
00210                                 break;
00211                 }
00212         }
00213 
00214         if (queued > 0)
00215                 result = osc_queue_sync_pages(env, osc, &list, cmd, brw_flags);
00216 
00217         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%d/%d %d\n", qin->pl_nr, qout->pl_nr, result);
00218         return qout->pl_nr > 0 ? 0 : result;
00219 }
00220 
00228 static void osc_page_touch_at(const struct lu_env *env,
00229                               struct cl_object *obj, pgoff_t idx, size_t to)
00230 {
00231         struct lov_oinfo  *loi  = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00232         struct cl_attr    *attr = &osc_env_info(env)->oti_attr;
00233         int valid;
00234         __u64 kms;
00235 
00236         /* offset within stripe */
00237         kms = cl_offset(obj, idx) + to;
00238 
00239         cl_object_attr_lock(obj);
00240         /*
00241          * XXX old code used
00242          *
00243          *         ll_inode_size_lock(inode, 0); lov_stripe_lock(lsm);
00244          *
00245          * here
00246          */
00247         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "stripe KMS %sincreasing "LPU64"->"LPU64" "LPU64"\n",
00248                kms > loi->loi_kms ? "" : "not ", loi->loi_kms, kms,
00249                loi->loi_lvb.lvb_size);
00250 
00251         attr->cat_mtime = attr->cat_ctime = LTIME_S(CURRENT_TIME);
00252         valid = CAT_MTIME | CAT_CTIME;
00253         if (kms > loi->loi_kms) {
00254                 attr->cat_kms = kms;
00255                 valid |= CAT_KMS;
00256         }
00257         if (kms > loi->loi_lvb.lvb_size) {
00258                 attr->cat_size = kms;
00259                 valid |= CAT_SIZE;
00260         }
00261         cl_object_attr_update(env, obj, attr, valid);
00262         cl_object_attr_unlock(obj);
00263 }
00264 
00265 static int osc_io_commit_async(const struct lu_env *env,
00266                                 const struct cl_io_slice *ios,
00267                                 struct cl_page_list *qin, int from, int to,
00268                                 cl_commit_cbt cb)
00269 {
00270         struct cl_io    *io = ios->cis_io;
00271         struct osc_io   *oio = cl2osc_io(env, ios);
00272         struct osc_object *osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00273         struct cl_page  *page;
00274         struct cl_page  *last_page;
00275         struct osc_page *opg;
00276         int result = 0;
00277         ENTRY;
00278 
00279         LASSERT(qin->pl_nr > 0);
00280 
00281         /* Handle partial page cases */
00282         last_page = cl_page_list_last(qin);
00283         if (oio->oi_lockless) {
00284                 page = cl_page_list_first(qin);
00285                 if (page == last_page) {
00286                         cl_page_clip(env, page, from, to);
00287                 } else {
00288                         if (from != 0)
00289                                 cl_page_clip(env, page, from, PAGE_SIZE);
00290                         if (to != PAGE_SIZE)
00291                                 cl_page_clip(env, last_page, 0, to);
00292                 }
00293         }
00294 
00295         while (qin->pl_nr > 0) {
00296                 struct osc_async_page *oap;
00297 
00298                 page = cl_page_list_first(qin);
00299                 opg = osc_cl_page_osc(page, osc);
00300                 oap = &opg->ops_oap;
00301 
00302                 if (!list_empty(&oap->oap_rpc_item)) {
00303                         CDEBUG(D_CACHE, "Busy oap %p page %p for submit.\n",
00304                                oap, opg);
00305                         result = -EBUSY;
00306                         break;
00307                 }
00308 
00309                 /* The page may be already in dirty cache. */
00310                 if (list_empty(&oap->oap_pending_item)) {
00311                         result = osc_page_cache_add(env, &opg->ops_cl, io);
00312                         if (result != 0)
00313                                 break;
00314                 }
00315 
00316                 osc_page_touch_at(env, osc2cl(osc), osc_index(opg),
00317                                   page == last_page ? to : PAGE_SIZE);
00318 
00319                 cl_page_list_del(env, qin, page);
00320 
00321                 (*cb)(env, io, page);
00322                 /* Can't access page any more. Page can be in transfer and
00323                  * complete at any time. */
00324         }
00325 
00326         /* for sync write, kernel will wait for this page to be flushed before
00327          * osc_io_end() is called, so release it earlier.
00328          * for mkwrite(), it's known there is no further pages. */
00329         if (cl_io_is_sync_write(io) && oio->oi_active != NULL) {
00330                 osc_extent_release(env, oio->oi_active);
00331                 oio->oi_active = NULL;
00332         }
00333 
00334         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%d %d\n", qin->pl_nr, result);
00335         RETURN(result);
00336 }
00337 
00338 static int osc_io_iter_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00339                             const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00340 {
00341         struct osc_object *osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00342         struct obd_import *imp = osc_cli(osc)->cl_import;
00343         int rc = -EIO;
00344 
00345         spin_lock(&imp->imp_lock);
00346         if (likely(!imp->imp_invalid)) {
00347                 struct osc_io *oio = osc_env_io(env);
00348 
00349                 atomic_inc(&osc->oo_nr_ios);
00350                 oio->oi_is_active = 1;
00351                 rc = 0;
00352         }
00353         spin_unlock(&imp->imp_lock);
00354 
00355         return rc;
00356 }
00357 
00358 static int osc_io_write_iter_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00359                                   const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00360 {
00361         struct cl_io *io = ios->cis_io;
00362         struct osc_io *oio = osc_env_io(env);
00363         struct osc_object *osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00364         unsigned long npages;
00365         ENTRY;
00366 
00367         if (cl_io_is_append(io))
00368                 RETURN(osc_io_iter_init(env, ios));
00369 
00370         npages = io->u.ci_rw.crw_count >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00371         if (io->u.ci_rw.crw_pos & ~PAGE_MASK)
00372                 ++npages;
00373 
00374         oio->oi_lru_reserved = osc_lru_reserve(osc_cli(osc), npages);
00375 
00376         RETURN(osc_io_iter_init(env, ios));
00377 }
00378 
00379 static void osc_io_iter_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00380                              const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00381 {
00382         struct osc_io *oio = osc_env_io(env);
00383 
00384         if (oio->oi_is_active) {
00385                 struct osc_object *osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00386 
00387                 oio->oi_is_active = 0;
00388                 LASSERT(atomic_read(&osc->oo_nr_ios) > 0);
00389                 if (atomic_dec_and_test(&osc->oo_nr_ios))
00390                         wake_up_all(&osc->oo_io_waitq);
00391         }
00392 }
00393 
00394 static void osc_io_write_iter_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00395                                    const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00396 {
00397         struct osc_io *oio = osc_env_io(env);
00398         struct osc_object *osc = cl2osc(ios->cis_obj);
00399 
00400         if (oio->oi_lru_reserved > 0) {
00401                 osc_lru_unreserve(osc_cli(osc), oio->oi_lru_reserved);
00402                 oio->oi_lru_reserved = 0;
00403         }
00404         oio->oi_write_osclock = NULL;
00405 
00406         osc_io_iter_fini(env, ios);
00407 }
00408 
00409 static int osc_io_fault_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00410                               const struct cl_io_slice *ios)
00411 {
00412         struct cl_io       *io;
00413         struct cl_fault_io *fio;
00414         ENTRY;
00415 
00416         io  = ios->cis_io;
00417         fio = &io->u.ci_fault;
00418         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%lu %d %zu\n",
00419                 fio->ft_index, fio->ft_writable, fio->ft_nob);
00420         /*
00421          * If mapping is writeable, adjust kms to cover this page,
00422          * but do not extend kms beyond actual file size.
00423          * See bug 10919.
00424          */
00425         if (fio->ft_writable)
00426                 osc_page_touch_at(env, ios->cis_obj,
00427                                   fio->ft_index, fio->ft_nob);
00428         RETURN(0);
00429 }
00430 
00431 static int osc_async_upcall(void *a, int rc)
00432 {
00433         struct osc_async_cbargs *args = a;
00434 
00435         args->opc_rc = rc;
00436         complete(&args->opc_sync);
00437         return 0;
00438 }
00439 
00443 static int trunc_check_cb(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io,
00444                           struct osc_page *ops , void *cbdata)
00445 {
00446         struct cl_page *page = ops->ops_cl.cpl_page;
00447         struct osc_async_page *oap;
00448         __u64 start = *(__u64 *)cbdata;
00449 
00450         oap = &ops->ops_oap;
00451         if (oap->oap_cmd & OBD_BRW_WRITE &&
00452             !list_empty(&oap->oap_pending_item))
00453                 CL_PAGE_DEBUG(D_ERROR, env, page, "exists " LPU64 "/%s.\n",
00454                                 start, current->comm);
00455 
00456         if (PageLocked(page->cp_vmpage))
00457                 CDEBUG(D_CACHE, "page %p index %lu locked for %d.\n",
00458                        ops, osc_index(ops), oap->oap_cmd & OBD_BRW_RWMASK);
00459 
00460         return CLP_GANG_OKAY;
00461 }
00462 
00463 static void osc_trunc_check(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_io *io,
00464                             struct osc_io *oio, __u64 size)
00465 {
00466         struct cl_object *clob;
00467         int     partial;
00468         pgoff_t start;
00469 
00470         clob    = oio->oi_cl.cis_obj;
00471         start   = cl_index(clob, size);
00472         partial = cl_offset(clob, start) < size;
00473 
00474         /*
00475          * Complain if there are pages in the truncated region.
00476          */
00477         osc_page_gang_lookup(env, io, cl2osc(clob),
00478                                 start + partial, CL_PAGE_EOF,
00479                                 trunc_check_cb, (void *)&size);
00480 }
00481 
00482 static int osc_io_setattr_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00483                                 const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00484 {
00485         struct cl_io            *io     = slice->cis_io;
00486         struct osc_io           *oio    = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00487         struct cl_object        *obj    = slice->cis_obj;
00488         struct lov_oinfo        *loi    = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00489         struct cl_attr          *attr   = &osc_env_info(env)->oti_attr;
00490         struct obdo             *oa     = &oio->oi_oa;
00491         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00492         __u64                    size   = io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_size;
00493         unsigned int             ia_valid = io->u.ci_setattr.sa_valid;
00494         int                      result = 0;
00495 
00496         /* truncate cache dirty pages first */
00497         if (cl_io_is_trunc(io))
00498                 result = osc_cache_truncate_start(env, cl2osc(obj), size,
00499                                                   &oio->oi_trunc);
00500 
00501         if (result == 0 && oio->oi_lockless == 0) {
00502                 cl_object_attr_lock(obj);
00503                 result = cl_object_attr_get(env, obj, attr);
00504                 if (result == 0) {
00505                         struct ost_lvb *lvb = &io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr;
00506                         unsigned int cl_valid = 0;
00507 
00508                         if (ia_valid & ATTR_SIZE) {
00509                                 attr->cat_size = attr->cat_kms = size;
00510                                 cl_valid = (CAT_SIZE | CAT_KMS);
00511                         }
00512                         if (ia_valid & ATTR_MTIME_SET) {
00513                                 attr->cat_mtime = lvb->lvb_mtime;
00514                                 cl_valid |= CAT_MTIME;
00515                         }
00516                         if (ia_valid & ATTR_ATIME_SET) {
00517                                 attr->cat_atime = lvb->lvb_atime;
00518                                 cl_valid |= CAT_ATIME;
00519                         }
00520                         if (ia_valid & ATTR_CTIME_SET) {
00521                                 attr->cat_ctime = lvb->lvb_ctime;
00522                                 cl_valid |= CAT_CTIME;
00523                         }
00524                         result = cl_object_attr_update(env, obj, attr,
00525                                                        cl_valid);
00526                 }
00527                 cl_object_attr_unlock(obj);
00528         }
00529         memset(oa, 0, sizeof(*oa));
00530         if (result == 0) {
00531                 oa->o_oi = loi->loi_oi;
00532                 obdo_set_parent_fid(oa, io->u.ci_setattr.sa_parent_fid);
00533                 oa->o_stripe_idx = io->u.ci_setattr.sa_stripe_index;
00534                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
00535                 if (ia_valid & ATTR_CTIME) {
00536                         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLCTIME;
00537                         oa->o_ctime = attr->cat_ctime;
00538                 }
00539                 if (ia_valid & ATTR_ATIME) {
00540                         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLATIME;
00541                         oa->o_atime = attr->cat_atime;
00542                 }
00543                 if (ia_valid & ATTR_MTIME) {
00544                         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLMTIME;
00545                         oa->o_mtime = attr->cat_mtime;
00546                 }
00547                 if (ia_valid & ATTR_SIZE) {
00548                         oa->o_size = size;
00549                         oa->o_blocks = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
00550                         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS;
00551 
00552                         if (oio->oi_lockless) {
00553                                 oa->o_flags = OBD_FL_SRVLOCK;
00554                                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00555                         }
00556                 } else {
00557                         LASSERT(oio->oi_lockless == 0);
00558                 }
00559 
00560                 if (ia_valid & ATTR_ATTR_FLAG) {
00561                         oa->o_flags = io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr_flags;
00562                         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00563                 }
00564 
00565                 init_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00566 
00567                 if (ia_valid & ATTR_SIZE)
00568                         result = osc_punch_base(osc_export(cl2osc(obj)),
00569                                                 oa, osc_async_upcall,
00570                                                 cbargs, PTLRPCD_SET);
00571                 else
00572                         result = osc_setattr_async(osc_export(cl2osc(obj)),
00573                                                    oa, osc_async_upcall,
00574                                                    cbargs, PTLRPCD_SET);
00575 
00576                 cbargs->opc_rpc_sent = result == 0;
00577         }
00578 
00579         return result;
00580 }
00581 
00582 static void osc_io_setattr_end(const struct lu_env *env,
00583                                const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00584 {
00585         struct cl_io     *io  = slice->cis_io;
00586         struct osc_io    *oio = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00587         struct cl_object *obj = slice->cis_obj;
00588         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00589         int result = 0;
00590 
00591         if (cbargs->opc_rpc_sent) {
00592                 wait_for_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00593                 result = io->ci_result = cbargs->opc_rc;
00594         }
00595         if (result == 0) {
00596                 if (oio->oi_lockless) {
00597                         /* lockless truncate */
00598                         struct osc_device *osd = lu2osc_dev(obj->co_lu.lo_dev);
00599 
00600                         LASSERT(cl_io_is_trunc(io));
00601                         /* XXX: Need a lock. */
00602                         osd->od_stats.os_lockless_truncates++;
00603                 }
00604         }
00605 
00606         if (cl_io_is_trunc(io)) {
00607                 __u64 size = io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_size;
00608                 osc_trunc_check(env, io, oio, size);
00609                 osc_cache_truncate_end(env, oio->oi_trunc);
00610                 oio->oi_trunc = NULL;
00611         }
00612 }
00613 
00614 struct osc_data_version_args {
00615         struct osc_io *dva_oio;
00616 };
00617 
00618 static int
00619 osc_data_version_interpret(const struct lu_env *env, struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00620                            void *arg, int rc)
00621 {
00622         struct osc_data_version_args *dva = arg;
00623         struct osc_io *oio = dva->dva_oio;
00624         const struct ost_body *body;
00625 
00626         ENTRY;
00627         if (rc < 0)
00628                 GOTO(out, rc);
00629 
00630         body = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
00631         if (body == NULL)
00632                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00633 
00634         lustre_get_wire_obdo(&req->rq_import->imp_connect_data, &oio->oi_oa,
00635                              &body->oa);
00636         EXIT;
00637 out:
00638         oio->oi_cbarg.opc_rc = rc;
00639         complete(&oio->oi_cbarg.opc_sync);
00640 
00641         return 0;
00642 }
00643 
00644 static int osc_io_data_version_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00645                                      const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00646 {
00647         struct cl_data_version_io *dv   = &slice->cis_io->u.ci_data_version;
00648         struct osc_io           *oio    = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00649         struct obdo             *oa     = &oio->oi_oa;
00650         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00651         struct osc_object       *obj    = cl2osc(slice->cis_obj);
00652         struct lov_oinfo        *loi    = obj->oo_oinfo;
00653         struct obd_export       *exp    = osc_export(obj);
00654         struct ptlrpc_request   *req;
00655         struct ost_body         *body;
00656         struct osc_data_version_args *dva;
00657         int rc;
00658 
00659         ENTRY;
00660         memset(oa, 0, sizeof(*oa));
00661         oa->o_oi = loi->loi_oi;
00662         oa->o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
00663 
00664         if (dv->dv_flags & (LL_DV_RD_FLUSH | LL_DV_WR_FLUSH)) {
00665                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00666                 oa->o_flags |= OBD_FL_SRVLOCK;
00667                 if (dv->dv_flags & LL_DV_WR_FLUSH)
00668                         oa->o_flags |= OBD_FL_FLUSH;
00669         }
00670 
00671         init_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00672 
00673         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp), &RQF_OST_GETATTR);
00674         if (req == NULL)
00675                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00676 
00677         rc = ptlrpc_request_pack(req, LUSTRE_OST_VERSION, OST_GETATTR);
00678         if (rc < 0) {
00679                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00680                 RETURN(rc);
00681         }
00682 
00683         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
00684         lustre_set_wire_obdo(&req->rq_import->imp_connect_data, &body->oa, oa);
00685 
00686         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00687         req->rq_interpret_reply = osc_data_version_interpret;
00688         CLASSERT(sizeof(*dva) <= sizeof(req->rq_async_args));
00689         dva = ptlrpc_req_async_args(req);
00690         dva->dva_oio = oio;
00691 
00692         ptlrpcd_add_req(req);
00693 
00694         RETURN(0);
00695 }
00696 
00697 static void osc_io_data_version_end(const struct lu_env *env,
00698                                     const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00699 {
00700         struct cl_data_version_io *dv = &slice->cis_io->u.ci_data_version;
00701         struct osc_io           *oio    = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00702         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00703 
00704         ENTRY;
00705         wait_for_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00706 
00707         if (cbargs->opc_rc != 0) {
00708                 slice->cis_io->ci_result = cbargs->opc_rc;
00709         } else if (!(oio->oi_oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLDATAVERSION)) {
00710                 slice->cis_io->ci_result = -EOPNOTSUPP;
00711         } else {
00712                 dv->dv_data_version = oio->oi_oa.o_data_version;
00713                 slice->cis_io->ci_result = 0;
00714         }
00715 
00716         EXIT;
00717 }
00718 
00719 static int osc_io_read_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00720                              const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00721 {
00722         struct cl_object *obj  = slice->cis_obj;
00723         struct cl_attr   *attr = &osc_env_info(env)->oti_attr;
00724         int rc = 0;
00725         ENTRY;
00726 
00727         if (!slice->cis_io->ci_noatime) {
00728                 cl_object_attr_lock(obj);
00729                 attr->cat_atime = LTIME_S(CURRENT_TIME);
00730                 rc = cl_object_attr_update(env, obj, attr, CAT_ATIME);
00731                 cl_object_attr_unlock(obj);
00732         }
00733 
00734         RETURN(rc);
00735 }
00736 
00737 static int osc_io_write_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00738                               const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00739 {
00740         struct cl_object *obj   = slice->cis_obj;
00741         struct cl_attr   *attr  = &osc_env_info(env)->oti_attr;
00742         int rc = 0;
00743         ENTRY;
00744 
00745         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_OSC_DELAY_SETTIME, 1);
00746         cl_object_attr_lock(obj);
00747         attr->cat_mtime = attr->cat_ctime = LTIME_S(CURRENT_TIME);
00748         rc = cl_object_attr_update(env, obj, attr, CAT_MTIME | CAT_CTIME);
00749         cl_object_attr_unlock(obj);
00750 
00751         RETURN(rc);
00752 }
00753 
00754 static int osc_fsync_ost(const struct lu_env *env, struct osc_object *obj,
00755                          struct cl_fsync_io *fio)
00756 {
00757         struct osc_io    *oio   = osc_env_io(env);
00758         struct obdo      *oa    = &oio->oi_oa;
00759         struct lov_oinfo *loi   = obj->oo_oinfo;
00760         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00761         int rc = 0;
00762         ENTRY;
00763 
00764         memset(oa, 0, sizeof(*oa));
00765         oa->o_oi = loi->loi_oi;
00766         oa->o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
00767 
00768         /* reload size abd blocks for start and end of sync range */
00769         oa->o_size = fio->fi_start;
00770         oa->o_blocks = fio->fi_end;
00771         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS;
00772 
00773         obdo_set_parent_fid(oa, fio->fi_fid);
00774 
00775         init_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00776 
00777         rc = osc_sync_base(obj, oa, osc_async_upcall, cbargs, PTLRPCD_SET);
00778         RETURN(rc);
00779 }
00780 
00781 static int osc_io_fsync_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00782                               const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00783 {
00784         struct cl_io       *io  = slice->cis_io;
00785         struct cl_fsync_io *fio = &io->u.ci_fsync;
00786         struct cl_object   *obj = slice->cis_obj;
00787         struct osc_object  *osc = cl2osc(obj);
00788         pgoff_t start  = cl_index(obj, fio->fi_start);
00789         pgoff_t end    = cl_index(obj, fio->fi_end);
00790         int     result = 0;
00791         ENTRY;
00792 
00793         if (fio->fi_end == OBD_OBJECT_EOF)
00794                 end = CL_PAGE_EOF;
00795 
00796         result = osc_cache_writeback_range(env, osc, start, end, 0,
00797                                            fio->fi_mode == CL_FSYNC_DISCARD);
00798         if (result > 0) {
00799                 fio->fi_nr_written += result;
00800                 result = 0;
00801         }
00802         if (fio->fi_mode == CL_FSYNC_ALL) {
00803                 int rc;
00804 
00805                 /* we have to wait for writeback to finish before we can
00806                  * send OST_SYNC RPC. This is bad because it causes extents
00807                  * to be written osc by osc. However, we usually start
00808                  * writeback before CL_FSYNC_ALL so this won't have any real
00809                  * problem. */
00810                 rc = osc_cache_wait_range(env, osc, start, end);
00811                 if (result == 0)
00812                         result = rc;
00813                 rc = osc_fsync_ost(env, osc, fio);
00814                 if (result == 0)
00815                         result = rc;
00816         }
00817 
00818         RETURN(result);
00819 }
00820 
00821 static void osc_io_fsync_end(const struct lu_env *env,
00822                              const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00823 {
00824         struct cl_fsync_io *fio = &slice->cis_io->u.ci_fsync;
00825         struct cl_object   *obj = slice->cis_obj;
00826         pgoff_t start = cl_index(obj, fio->fi_start);
00827         pgoff_t end   = cl_index(obj, fio->fi_end);
00828         int result = 0;
00829 
00830         if (fio->fi_mode == CL_FSYNC_LOCAL) {
00831                 result = osc_cache_wait_range(env, cl2osc(obj), start, end);
00832         } else if (fio->fi_mode == CL_FSYNC_ALL) {
00833                 struct osc_io           *oio    = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00834                 struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00835 
00836                 wait_for_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00837                 if (result == 0)
00838                         result = cbargs->opc_rc;
00839         }
00840         slice->cis_io->ci_result = result;
00841 }
00842 
00843 static int osc_io_ladvise_start(const struct lu_env *env,
00844                                 const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00845 {
00846         int                      result = 0;
00847         struct cl_io            *io = slice->cis_io;
00848         struct osc_io           *oio = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00849         struct cl_object        *obj = slice->cis_obj;
00850         struct lov_oinfo        *loi = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00851         struct cl_ladvise_io    *lio = &io->u.ci_ladvise;
00852         struct obdo             *oa = &oio->oi_oa;
00853         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00854         struct lu_ladvise       *ladvise;
00855         struct ladvise_hdr      *ladvise_hdr;
00856         int                      buf_size;
00857         int                      num_advise = 1;
00858         ENTRY;
00859 
00860         /* TODO: add multiple ladvise support in CLIO */
00861         buf_size = offsetof(typeof(*ladvise_hdr), lah_advise[num_advise]);
00862         if (osc_env_info(env)->oti_ladvise_buf.lb_len < buf_size)
00863                 lu_buf_realloc(&osc_env_info(env)->oti_ladvise_buf, buf_size);
00864 
00865         ladvise_hdr = osc_env_info(env)->oti_ladvise_buf.lb_buf;
00866         if (ladvise_hdr == NULL)
00867                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00868 
00869         memset(ladvise_hdr, 0, buf_size);
00870         ladvise_hdr->lah_magic = LADVISE_MAGIC;
00871         ladvise_hdr->lah_count = num_advise;
00872         ladvise_hdr->lah_flags = lio->li_flags;
00873 
00874         memset(oa, 0, sizeof(*oa));
00875         oa->o_oi = loi->loi_oi;
00876         oa->o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID;
00877         obdo_set_parent_fid(oa, lio->li_fid);
00878 
00879         ladvise = ladvise_hdr->lah_advise;
00880         ladvise->lla_start = lio->li_start;
00881         ladvise->lla_end = lio->li_end;
00882         ladvise->lla_advice = lio->li_advice;
00883 
00884         if (lio->li_flags & LF_ASYNC) {
00885                 result = osc_ladvise_base(osc_export(cl2osc(obj)), oa,
00886                                           ladvise_hdr, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00887         } else {
00888                 init_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00889                 result = osc_ladvise_base(osc_export(cl2osc(obj)), oa,
00890                                           ladvise_hdr, osc_async_upcall,
00891                                           cbargs, PTLRPCD_SET);
00892                 cbargs->opc_rpc_sent = result == 0;
00893         }
00894         RETURN(result);
00895 }
00896 
00897 static void osc_io_ladvise_end(const struct lu_env *env,
00898                                const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00899 {
00900         struct cl_io            *io = slice->cis_io;
00901         struct osc_io           *oio = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00902         struct osc_async_cbargs *cbargs = &oio->oi_cbarg;
00903         int                      result = 0;
00904         struct cl_ladvise_io    *lio = &io->u.ci_ladvise;
00905 
00906         if ((!(lio->li_flags & LF_ASYNC)) && cbargs->opc_rpc_sent) {
00907                 wait_for_completion(&cbargs->opc_sync);
00908                 result = cbargs->opc_rc;
00909         }
00910         slice->cis_io->ci_result = result;
00911 }
00912 
00913 static void osc_io_end(const struct lu_env *env,
00914                        const struct cl_io_slice *slice)
00915 {
00916         struct osc_io *oio = cl2osc_io(env, slice);
00917 
00918         if (oio->oi_active) {
00919                 osc_extent_release(env, oio->oi_active);
00920                 oio->oi_active = NULL;
00921         }
00922 }
00923 
00924 static const struct cl_io_operations osc_io_ops = {
00925         .op = {
00926                 [CIT_READ] = {
00927                         .cio_iter_init = osc_io_iter_init,
00928                         .cio_iter_fini = osc_io_iter_fini,
00929                         .cio_start  = osc_io_read_start,
00930                         .cio_fini   = osc_io_fini
00931                 },
00932                 [CIT_WRITE] = {
00933                         .cio_iter_init = osc_io_write_iter_init,
00934                         .cio_iter_fini = osc_io_write_iter_fini,
00935                         .cio_start  = osc_io_write_start,
00936                         .cio_end    = osc_io_end,
00937                         .cio_fini   = osc_io_fini
00938                 },
00939                 [CIT_SETATTR] = {
00940                         .cio_iter_init = osc_io_iter_init,
00941                         .cio_iter_fini = osc_io_iter_fini,
00942                         .cio_start  = osc_io_setattr_start,
00943                         .cio_end    = osc_io_setattr_end
00944                 },
00945                 [CIT_DATA_VERSION] = {
00946                         .cio_start  = osc_io_data_version_start,
00947                         .cio_end    = osc_io_data_version_end,
00948                 },
00949                 [CIT_FAULT] = {
00950                         .cio_iter_init = osc_io_iter_init,
00951                         .cio_iter_fini = osc_io_iter_fini,
00952                         .cio_start  = osc_io_fault_start,
00953                         .cio_end    = osc_io_end,
00954                         .cio_fini   = osc_io_fini
00955                 },
00956                 [CIT_FSYNC] = {
00957                         .cio_start  = osc_io_fsync_start,
00958                         .cio_end    = osc_io_fsync_end,
00959                         .cio_fini   = osc_io_fini
00960                 },
00961                 [CIT_LADVISE] = {
00962                         .cio_start  = osc_io_ladvise_start,
00963                         .cio_end    = osc_io_ladvise_end,
00964                         .cio_fini   = osc_io_fini
00965                 },
00966                 [CIT_MISC] = {
00967                         .cio_fini   = osc_io_fini
00968                 }
00969         },
00970         .cio_read_ahead             = osc_io_read_ahead,
00971         .cio_submit                 = osc_io_submit,
00972         .cio_commit_async           = osc_io_commit_async
00973 };
00974 
00975 /*****************************************************************************
00976  *
00977  * Transfer operations.
00978  *
00979  */
00980 
00981 int osc_io_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00982                 struct cl_object *obj, struct cl_io *io)
00983 {
00984         struct osc_io *oio = osc_env_io(env);
00985 
00986         CL_IO_SLICE_CLEAN(oio, oi_cl);
00987         cl_io_slice_add(io, &oio->oi_cl, obj, &osc_io_ops);
00988         return 0;
00989 }
